location.name: Salt Lake County Justice Court
location.address: 2001 S State St #4200, Salt Lake City, UT 84190

room.name: 2A
room.instructions: enter through the metal detector, go up the stairs or elevator to the second floor, find the west hallway, and find the room number above the door.

room.arrival_instructions: enter the waiting room on the first floor, sign-in with the receptionist, and wait for your name to be called.
